## challenge56 - 基于比特偏转的 RC4 破解

RC4 是一种流密码加密算法，在对同样的明文进行加密的时候，加密结果在某些比特位会显现出特殊的规律性，基于这种特性可以对 RC4 进行爆破

![rc4ciphers](rc4ciphers.png)

代码执行需要大概十分钟。

```
λ python cryptopals56.py
               AA :  0000000000000000000000000064000000000000000000000000000000af
              AAA :  000000000000000000000000ca6400000000000000000000000000008caf
             AAAA :  000000000000000000000022ca64000000000000000000000000009e8caf
            AAAAA :  000000000000000000007922ca64000000000000000000000000bd9e8caf
           AAAAAA :  000000000000000000047922ca64000000000000000000000052bd9e8caf
          AAAAAAA :  000000000000000006047922ca64000000000000000000005b52bd9e8caf
         AAAAAAAA :  00000000000000e206047922ca64000000000000000000095b52bd9e8caf
        AAAAAAAAA :  0000000000004ae206047922ca64000000000000000028095b52bd9e8caf
       AAAAAAAAAA :  0000000000664ae206047922ca6400000000000000c928095b52bd9e8caf
      AAAAAAAAAAA :  0000000090664ae206047922ca640000000000005ac928095b52bd9e8caf
     AAAAAAAAAAAA :  000000eb90664ae206047922ca640000000000525ac928095b52bd9e8caf
    AAAAAAAAAAAAA :  0000fdeb90664ae206047922ca640000000092525ac928095b52bd9e8caf
   AAAAAAAAAAAAAA :  003bfdeb90664ae206047922ca640000003d92525ac928095b52bd9e8caf
  AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA :  d43bfdeb90664ae206047922ca640000893d92525ac928095b52bd9e8caf
 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA :  d43bfdeb90664ae206047922ca640066893d92525ac928095b52bd9e8c9a
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA :  d43bfdeb90664ae206047922ca641366893d92525ac928095b52bd9ecd9a
spend time: 656.586621442
```
